name: Convenience Store

arrival.text: You push into a *Convenience Store*. Neon hum, stale coffee, bored clerk.

flavor: Neon hum, stale coffee, bored clerk.
weatherPool: Wind hums in the sign wiring.
Drizzle turns the sidewalk to mirror.
activityPool: Bo warms his hands near the coffee urn.
Bo notes a shadow loitering by the door.
